data.value: Explore, review, and contribute to my project through GitHub

data.name: Dashboard.Actions.SupportMe.Description

data.name: Settings.LanguageChanged.Description
data.value: You need to restart the application to apply the new language.

data.name: Settings.Appearance.ThemeSelector.Description
data.value: Select your preferred theme for the app.

data.name: Optimizer.UI.Risk.Help
data.value: This value reflects the level of intervention and the safety of the optimization process. Please exercise caution and consider carefully before applying any optimization.

data.name: Optimizer.UI.Tags.Help
data.value: These tags indicate which parts of the system the optimization will affect.

data.name: Service.Service.Error.UpdateRegistryForStartupTypeFailed
data.value: Failed to update registry for startup type

data.name: OptimizationDetailsDialog.Other.OpenRevertFile.Description
data.value: Open the folder and select the rollback data file for this optimization.

data.name: OptimizationResultDialog.Description
data.value: Some steps didn't complete successfully. You can retry only the failed steps.

data.name: Settings.About.Duck.Description
data.value: Thank you for your trust and support <3! Current version: {0}

data.name: Settings.Optimize.ShellTimeout.Description
data.value: Timeout for each shell command execution (milliseconds).

data.name: Settings.Advanced.ClearResources.Description
data.value: Delete all files downloaded during the optimization process.

data.name: Settings.Advanced.ClearRevertDatas.Description
data.value: Clear all rollback data from optimizations.

data.name: Settings.Advanced.OpenRootDir.Description
data.value: Open the application's root directory, where all necessary files are stored.

data.name: Dialog.AreYouSure.Title
data.value: Do you really want to proceed?

data.name: Settings.ClearResources.Description
data.value: You are about to delete all resources downloaded or generated during the optimization process. Please note that this action is permanent and cannot be undone, so make sure you are certain before proceeding.

data.name: Settings.ClearRevertData.Description
data.value: You are about to delete all rollback data generated after the optimization process. This means you will no longer be able to restore the pre-optimization state, so please think carefully before confirming.

data.name: ProcessingOptimizationDialog.Warning.DontCloseAppOrRestart
data.value: Please don't close the app or restart while changes are being applied or reverted.

data.name: Optimizer.Performance.DisableBackgroundApps.ShortDescription
data.value: Blocks supported apps from running in the background, reducing idle RAM/CPU usage and improving responsiveness.

data.name: Optimizer.Performance.ProcessPriority.ShortDescription
data.value: Tunes Windows scheduler foreground boost so active apps feel snappier and input latency is reduced.

data.name: Optimizer.Performance.GameTaskScheduling.ShortDescription
data.value: Adjusts MMCSS “Games” task settings to prioritize game workloads for more consistent frame pacing.

data.name: Optimizer.Performance.MultimediaResponsiveness.ShortDescription
data.value: Reduces latency by tuning SystemProfile responsiveness and disabling network throttling for gaming and AV workloads.

data.name: Optimizer.Performance.DisableGameBar.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables Game Bar UI overlays and tips to reduce background overhead and interruptions.

data.name: Optimizer.Performance.EnableGameMode.ShortDescription
data.value: Enables Game Mode to prioritize gaming performance and limit background activity. (Recommended on Windows 11)

data.name: Optimizer.Performance.DisableGameDVR.ShortDescription
data.value: Turns off background game capture/recording features to free resources and reduce latency.

data.name: Optimizer.Performance.DisableMouseAcceleration.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables mouse acceleration for consistent, predictable cursor movement.

data.name: Optimizer.Performance.KeyboardLatencyOptimization.ShortDescription
data.value: Tunes keyboard delay/repeat rate and related accessibility flags to improve typing responsiveness.

data.name: Optimizer.PowerManagement.DisableHibernate.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables Hibernate and Fast Startup to free disk space and avoid using the hiberfile.

data.name: Optimizer.PowerManagement.DisableUSBPowerSaving.ShortDescription
data.value: Prevents USB root hubs from entering power-saving mode to reduce latency. May increase power usage on laptops.

data.name: Optimizer.PowerManagement.InstallOptimizerDuckPowerPlan.ShortDescription
data.value: Downloads, imports, and activates the optimizerDuck power plan to prioritize maximum performance. May increase power use, heat, and fan noise.

data.name: Optimizer.PowerManagement.DisablePowerSaving.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables power throttling and related power-saving behaviors to keep performance stable under load. May increase power use and temperatures.

data.name: Optimizer.SecurityAndPrivacy.DisableUAC.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables UAC (User Account Control) – the mechanism that asks for confirmation when running applications requiring Admin rights. Turning it off may reduce annoyance, but it also weakens important security protections.

data.name: Optimizer.SecurityAndPrivacy.DisableTelemetry.ShortDescription
data.value: Reduces Windows diagnostics/telemetry and feedback by applying policies, registry settings, services, and scheduled tasks. May affect error reporting and some compatibility features.

data.name: Optimizer.SecurityAndPrivacy.DisableAutoLogger.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables multiple WMI AutoLogger sessions to reduce background event logging; can make troubleshooting harder.

data.name: Optimizer.SecurityAndPrivacy.DisableCortana.ShortDescription
data.value: Removes Cortana and web search integration from Windows Search.

data.name: Optimizer.SecurityAndPrivacy.DisableCopilot.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables Windows Copilot and hides its UI integration in the taskbar and system shell.

data.name: Optimizer.SecurityAndPrivacy.DisableContentDeliveryManager.ShortDescription
data.value: Stops suggested apps, tips, and Windows content delivery recommendations.

data.name: Optimizer.BloatwareAndServices.DisablePreinstalledApps.ShortDescription
data.value: Blocks Windows from automatically installing OEM/bundled apps and suggested apps, helping keep the system cleaner from bloatware (especially after a fresh install or reset).

data.name: Optimizer.BloatwareAndServices.ConfigureServices.ShortDescription
data.value: Switches non-critical system services to manual start, reducing background usage without breaking functionality. Required services will start automatically when needed.

data.name: Optimizer.Gpu.AmdDisableUlps.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables AMD Ultra Low Power State to prevent GPU power-down issues and improve wake-up latency.

data.name: Optimizer.Gpu.AmdDisablePowerGating.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables AMD power gating features to maintain consistent GPU performance under load. May increase power draw and temperatures.

data.name: Optimizer.Gpu.AmdDisableVideoClockGating.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables AMD video engine clock gating to improve video processing performance and stability. May increase power usage.

data.name: Optimizer.Gpu.AmdDisableAspm.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables AMD Active State Power Management to reduce latency and improve responsiveness. May increase PCIe power draw.

data.name: Optimizer.Gpu.NvidiaDisableDynamicPstate.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables NVIDIA dynamic power state transitions to maintain consistent performance. May increase idle power usage.

data.name: Optimizer.Gpu.NvidiaDisableAsyncPstates.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables NVIDIA asynchronous power state management for more predictable performance. May increase power usage.

data.name: Optimizer.Gpu.IntelDisableAsyncFlips.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables Intel asynchronous flip operations to reduce display latency and improve tearing resistance.

data.name: Optimizer.Gpu.IntelDisableAdaptiveVsync.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables Intel adaptive vertical sync to provide more consistent frame timing.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.DisableTaskbarNewsAndInterests.ShortDescription
data.value: Removes the news and interests widget from the taskbar to reduce distractions and resource usage.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.DisableTaskbarExtraButtons.ShortDescription
data.value: Hides Widgets, Chat, and Task View buttons from the taskbar for a cleaner interface.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.DisableTaskbarSearchAndBing.ShortDescription
data.value: Removes the search box from taskbar and disables Bing web search integration.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.RemoveMeetNowAndPeople.ShortDescription
data.value: Removes Meet Now and People icons from the taskbar to reduce clutter.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.EnableTaskbarEndTask.ShortDescription
data.value: Adds the ability to right-click taskbar applications and select "End task" for quick process termination.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.EnableDarkMode.ShortDescription
data.value: Enables dark mode for system apps and interface elements to reduce eye strain.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.DisableExplorerAndSystemNotifications.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables various system notifications and sync provider notifications to reduce interruptions.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.ShowFileExtensionsAndHiddenFiles.ShortDescription
data.value: Makes file extensions visible and shows hidden system files for better file management.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.EnableClassicContextMenu.ShortDescription
data.value: Restores the classic Windows context menu instead of the modern simplified version.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.SpeedUpExplorerAndMenus.ShortDescription
data.value: Reduces Explorer startup delay and menu popup delay for faster interface response.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.ShowSecondsInSystemClock.ShortDescription
data.value: Adds seconds display to the system clock in the taskbar for more precise time tracking.

data.name: Optimizer.UserExperience.DisableVisualEffects.ShortDescription
data.value: Disables taskbar animations, shadows, transparency, and Aero Peek for better performance.

data.name: Settings.Optimize.ShellTimeout.Warning
data.value: Do NOT change unless you know exactly what you are doing

data.name: Optimizer.PowerManagement.InstallOptimizerDuckPowerPlan.Error.DownloadFailed
data.value: Failed to download optimizerDuck's power plan.

data.name: Settings.About.Acknowledgements.Description
data.value: optimizerDuck is made possible by the following open-source software and resources.

data.name: RestorePointDialog.Description
data.value: The Windows operating system includes a feature called Restore Point, which allows you to revert the system to its previous state before applying any changes or optimizations.

data.name: RestorePointDialog.Help
data.value: When you proceed, the application will automatically activate System Restore (if it is disabled) and create a new restore point with a name starting with "optimizerDuck...", helping safeguard the system before any changes.

data.name: RestorePoint.Snackbar.Error.Title
data.value: Unable to create or enable System Restore.

data.name: RestorePoint.Snackbar.Error.Message
data.value: An error occurred while creating or enabling System Restore. Please try creating it manually.

data.name: RestorePoint.Progress.Retrying
data.value: Retrying to create the restore point...

data.name: RestorePoint.Snackbar.Success.Message
data.value: A restore point has been created with the name: {0}.

data.name: Snackbar.OpenLinkFailed.Message
data.value: An error occurred while opening the path. Please check the log.

data.name: Snackbar.OpenFailed.Message
data.value: An error occurred while opening the folder or file. Please check the log.

data.name: Snackbar.OpenFailed.Title
data.value: Unable to open the folder or file
